nodes.text: Mabo was an MA-B0 cargo lifter droid who joined the Church of the Force. He was a believer and a pilgrim who believed in the Force. Mabo traveled to the planet Christophsis with four other pilgrims to follow the orders of Brin Izisca and return a crate of kyber crystals back to where they belonged. On the twelfth day Mabo was destroyed when he fell down in a big hole of the cave.
